findings.title: The risk that the liquidity pool cannot be removed
findings.description: Inconsistent usage of transferFrom and transfer functions may cause the risk that liquidity cannot be removed due to differences in return value specifications for ERC20 tokens.

findings.title: Inconsistent transferFrom and transfer functions may cause removeLiquidity operation to fail
findings.description: The inconsistent usage of `transferFrom` and `transfer` functions in addLiquidity and removeLiquidity operations respectively, may cause the removeLiquidity operation to fail due to non-conformity with ERC20 token standards.
